FROM entrust_product ep LEFT JOIN entrust_case_source ecs ON ecs.`id`= ep.`case_source_id` LEFT JOIN entrust en ON ecs.`entrust_id`=en.`id` LEFT JOIN employee_info em ON em.id = ep.staff LEFT JOIN employee_info emp ON emp.id = ep.custom_service_total where 1=1

and (DATE_FORMAT(contract_award_date,'%Y-%m-%d') between #{params.contractAwardDate} and #{params.contractAwardDate1})
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by ep.create_time desc
